SELECT T1.BASE_PD_CD /* 기준상품코드 */ , T2.PD_NM AS BASE_PD_NM , T1.APY_STRT_YM /* 적용시작년월 */ , T1.APY_END_YM /* 적용종료년월 */ , T1.FEE_PDCT_TP_CD1 /* 수수료제품유형코드1 */ , T1.FEE_PDCT_TP_CD2 /* 수수료제품유형코드2 */ , T1.DTA_DL_YN /* 데이터삭제여부 */ , T1.FST_RGST_DTM /* 최초등록일시 */ , (SELECT X.USR_NM FROM T_CMP_USR_ACO_M X WHERE ( X.USR_ID = T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID OR X.LOGIN_ID = T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID OR X.EPNO = T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID ) AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS FST_RGST_USR_ID /* 최초등록사용자ID */ , T1.FST_RGST_PRG_ID /* 최초등록프로그램ID */ , T1.FST_RGST_DEPT_ID /* 최초등록부서ID */ , T1.FNL_MDFC_DTM /* 최종수정일시 */ , (SELECT X.USR_NM FROM T_CMP_USR_ACO_M X WHERE ( X.USR_ID = T1.FNL_MDFC_USR_ID OR X.LOGIN_ID = T1.FNL_MDFC_USR_ID OR X.EPNO = T1.FNL_MDFC_USR_ID ) AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS FNL_MDFC_USR_ID , T1.FNL_MDFC_PRG_ID /* 최종수정프로그램ID */ , T1.FNL_MDFC_DEPT_ID /* 최종수정부서ID */ FROM TB_FEAM_WELS_FEE_PDCT_TP_BAS T1 /* 웰스수수료제품유형기본 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T2 ON T1.BASE_PD_CD = T2.PD_CD WHERE 1 = 1
AND T1.BASE_PD_CD = #{basePdCd} /* 기준상품코드 */
AND ( #{apyStrtYm} BETWEEN T1.APY_STRT_YM AND T1.APY_END_YM /* 적용시작년월 */ OR #{apyEndYm} BETWEEN T1.APY_STRT_YM AND T1.APY_END_YM /* 적용종료년월 */ )

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_FEAM_WELS_FEE_PDCT_TP_BAS WHERE BASE_PD_CD = #{basePdCd} AND ( REPLACE(REPLACE(#{apyStrtYm},'-',''),'.','') BETWEEN APY_STRT_YM AND APY_END_YM OR REPLACE(REPLACE(#{apyEndYm},'-',''),'.','') BETWEEN APY_STRT_YM AND APY_END_YM )
